department.dept_long_name: Committee on Higher Degrees in Biostatistics

course.title: Methods II
course.meeting_text: M., W., 8:30-10:20, and a weekly 90-minute lab
course.description: Intermediate course in the analysis of Gaussian, categorical, and survival data. The generalized linear model, Poisson regression, random effects and mixed models, comparing survival distributions, proportional hazards regression, splines and smoothing, the generalized additive model.
course.prerequisites: Biostatistics 232 or signature of instructor required.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO233.
